name: MLCMatMulDescriptor
desc: A configuration object you use to create a matrix multiplication layer.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a batched matrix multiplication descriptor.

items.name: init?(alpha: Float, transposesX: Bool, transposesY: Bool)
items.desc: Creates a batched matrix multiplication descriptor with the alpha value and transpose options you specify.

items.name: var alpha: Float
items.desc: A scalar value you specify to scale the result in C = alpha x A x B.

items.name: var transposesX: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that specifies whether you choose to transpose the last two dimensions of x.

items.name: var transposesY: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that specifies whether you choose to transpose the last two dimensions of y.
